sourcesContent: //importando as imagens necessarias import Mais from "../../Assets/+.png" import XdoTesouro from "../../Assets/x.png" //importando o style do Button import { FlexContainer } from "./styles.js" //importar HOOK de estado import { useStage } from "react" const Button = () => { const [games, setGames] = se return ( ) } export default Button
